original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – A man suspected to be involved in motorcycle thefts has been arrested in Piliyandala.
Police said the thefts took place in Nugegoda and Mount Lavinia.
He had stolen four motorbikes as well as the parts of two other motorbikes.
Govt. must uphold Constitution & Democracy, says Catholic Bishops’ Conference
Political vendetta or Due process? Rahul Gandhi appeals defamation conviction against PM Modi
Malaysia takes bold step to end mandatory death penalty and reform criminal justice system
